body_html:
if your input a n-dimensional tensor of some numeric type (say DT_UINT8 for byte values), you can represent them as JSON arrays. see the examples here:

https://github.com/tensorflow/serving/blob/master/tensorflow_serving/g3doc/api_rest.md#request-format-1

if your input is a serialized byte stream/blob, you need to encode it in base64. see:

https://github.com/tensorflow/serving/blob/master/tensorflow_serving/g3doc/api_rest.md#encoding-binary-values
